verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H4428><s%>, when all the kings that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%>, and in the lowland <S%H8219><s%>, and on all the shore <S%H2348><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>, heard thereof <S%H8085><s%>;
that they gathered <S%H6908><s%> themselves together <S%H3162><s%>, to fight <S%H3898><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with Israel <S%H3478><s%>, with one <S%H259><s%> accord <S%H6310><s%>.
But when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> what Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> unto Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and to Ai <S%H5857><s%>,

they also did work <S%H6213><s%> wilily <S%H6195><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> and made as if they had been ambassadors <S%H6737><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> old <S%H1087><s%> sacks <S%H8242><s%> upon their asses <S%H2543><s%>, and wine <S%H3196><s%> - skins <S%H4997><s%>, old <S%H1087><s%> and rent <S%H1234><s%> and bound up <S%H6887><s%>,

and old <S%H1087><s%> and patched <S%H2921><s%> shoes <S%H5275><s%> upon their feet <S%H7272><s%>, and old <S%H1087><s%> garments <S%H8008><s%> upon them <S%H3899><s%>; and all the bread of their provision <S%H6718><s%> was dry <S%H3001><s%> and was become mouldy <S%H5350><s%>.

And they went <S%H3212><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> unto the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, and to the men of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, We are come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%>: now therefore make <S%H3772><s%> ye a covenant with us <S%H1285><s%>.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, Peradventure <S%H194><s%> ye dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us <S%H3772><s%>; and how shall we make a covenant with you <S%H1285><s%>?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, We are thy servants <S%H5650><s%>. And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H370><s%>, Who are ye? and from whence come ye <S%H935><s%>?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3966><s%>, From a very far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> because of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: for we have heard <S%H8085><s%> the fame <S%H8089><s%> of him <S%H6213><s%>, and all that he did in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

and all that he did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and to Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, who was at Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>.

And our elders <S%H2205><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of our country <S%H776><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> to us <S%H559><s%>, saying, Take <S%H3947><s%> provision <S%H6720><s%> in your <S%H3027><s%> hand for the journey <S%H1870><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, and say unto them <S%H5650><s%>, We are your servants: and now make <S%H3772><s%> ye a covenant with us <S%H1285><s%>.

This our bread <S%H3899><s%> we took hot <S%H2525><s%> for our provision <S%H6679><s%> out of our houses <S%H1004><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> we came forth <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> unto you <S%H3001><s%>; but now, behold, it is dry, and is become mouldy <S%H5350><s%>:

and these wine <S%H3196><s%> - skins <S%H4997><s%>, which we filled <S%H4390><s%>, were new <S%H2319><s%>; and <S%H1234><s%>, behold, they are rent: and these our garments <S%H8008><s%> and our shoes <S%H5275><s%> are become old <S%H1086><s%> by reason of the very <S%H3966><s%> long <S%H7230><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%>.
And the men <S%H582><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of their provision <S%H6718><s%>, and asked <S%H7592><s%> not counsel at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with them <S%H3772><s%>, and made a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H2421><s%>, to let them live: and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> sware unto them <S%H7650><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> they had made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H8085><s%>, that they heard that they were their neighbors <S%H7138><s%>, and that they dwelt <S%H3427><s%> among them <S%H7130><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto their cities <S%H5892><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>. Now their cities <S%H5892><s%> were Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, and Chephirah <S%H3716><s%>, and Beeroth <S%H881><s%>, and Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them not <S%H5387><s%>, because the princes of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them by Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>. And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against the princes <S%H5387><s%>.

But all the princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, We have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them by Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: now therefore we may <S%H3201><s%> not touch them <S%H5060><s%>.
This we will do <S%H6213><s%> to them <S%H2421><s%>, and let them live; lest wrath <S%H7110><s%> be upon us <S%H7621><s%>, because of the oath which we sware unto them <S%H7650><s%>.

And the princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2421><s%>, Let them live: so they became hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, as the princes <S%H5387><s%> had spoken unto them <S%H1696><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for them <S%H1696><s%>, and he spake unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Wherefore have ye beguiled <S%H7411><s%> us <S%H559><s%>, saying, We are very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> from you <S%H3427><s%>; when ye dwell among us <S%H7130><s%>?

Now therefore ye are cursed <S%H779><s%>, and there shall never fail <S%H3772><s%> to be of you bondmen <S%H5650><s%>, both hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God <S%H430><s%>.

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Because it was certainly <S%H5046><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, how that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you all the land <S%H776><s%>, and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3966><s%>; therefore we were sore afraid <S%H3372><s%> for our lives <S%H5315><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you <S%H6213><s%>, and have done this thing <S%H1697><s%>.
And now <S%H2009><s%>, behold, we are in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: as it seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> unto thee to do <S%H6213><s%> unto us <S%H6213><s%>, do.
And so did <S%H6213><s%> he unto them <S%H5337><s%>, and delivered them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they slew them not <S%H2026><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> them that day <S%H3117><s%> hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and for the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he should choose <S%H977><s%>.
